page.title: 20Housing cont.
page.content: It is proposed within the next few years to renovate and also build a small new development in the area of old original cottages between the two main streets. The new houses will be mainly one and two-bedroomed flats and maisonettes designed for single people and young married couples. They will incorporate the traditional styles of the old cottage architecture but will be unusual in that they will sometimes have the living room upstairs and the bedrooms downstairs. They will not have gardens but a communal area of cobbles, seats and plant containers. Work has already started on this proposed piece of 'urban renewal'.
